content: I'm thinking of going with the KALLAX from IKEA. I've heard great things about it, and it seems like a good fit for my space and budget. I also like that it's easy to customize and can be used for other things besides game storage. Do you think it's a good idea to get some stackable plastic bins or crates to store my games in on the shelf? That way, I can keep them organized and make it easier to find the game I want to play.
